name: Mummy Adventure
description:
Mummy Adventure is an action 2D Platformer Game.

Time for adventure, deep in the mummy temple, inside a hidden tomb, lies the forbidden

treasure! Legend has it that whoever possesses the mummy treasure will rule the world.

Many adventures attempted to find it in the past, but none who laid eyes on it ever lived

to tell the tale, the temple is unforgiven!

Now it is time for the biggest adventure of your life, will you get inside the temple, find

the tomb and claim the treasures.
